tagline.en: A vote for GenerEOS is a vote for Charity!
tagline.zh: 投票GenerEOS，就是你对慈善事业的投票！

introduce.en: GenerEOS is a social enterprise block producing candidate with a mission of promoting and supporting scalable and highly reliable block production whilst giving back block rewards to charities. Based out of Sydney, Australia, GenerEOS is founded by a team of like minded blockchain enthusiasts with diverse backgrounds and a passion to make a difference in the world and fostering the spirit of generosity by giving back.
introduce.zh: GenerEOS是专业超级节点候选人，它的使命是建立一个促进，可持续发展和高度可靠的区块链生产，同时对慈善事业带来益处。GenerEOS总部设在澳大利亚的悉尼，由一群志同道合的区块链专业人士组成。他们虽拥有不同背景，却共有让世界不再一样的热诚，并努力把GenerEOS塑造成慷慨回馈社会的典范。
